intro.body: It’s after 10 PM and Senior Constable Ash Bowden is on to an unusual job.

ashOne.title: Ash Bowden
ashOne.body: Just up in Carrum Downs we’re looking for a car that was doing burnouts and then another calls come through saying that ummm...

ashTwo.title: Ash Bowden
ashTwo.body: ... a similar looking car or very similar description has crashed. So we’re just trying to get to it as quick as we can to see what the hell is going on.

introTwo.body: Witnesses to the incident have given the location of this shopping mall car park. Ash soon spots what he’s looking for.

actions.text: I’m just waiting for a mate.
Messed up my car doing swirleys mate...

prison.title: Ash Bowden
prison.body:
You can't be doing burnouts here mate. You've smashed up ya car.
You're coming to the station with me.

ashFive.title: Ash Bowden
ashFive.body: Is that why your cars all smashed up and you’re up on the grass at the moment or what?

actions.text: Yeah… just waiting for a mate he’s gone in… in there. Why?
